about_the_game:
Hero Siege brings you the loot with a legion of playable character classes, procedurally generated world, over 1000 unique items, endless replayability and a wide variety of dungeons and dangerous zones to explore! Our small team is made of ARPG veterans who love the genre and pour their souls to constantly improve and add new content for the players to enjoy!

We value player feedback and are welcoming all new players to chat with us in our Discord server. Join here:

Key Features

  • 22 Playable Character classes
    Hero Siege offers a wide variety of classes that have their unique skill trees and playstyles. The skills for each class can be enhanced further with augments and unique skills on various items resulting in very interesting and fun ways of playing the game!
  • 1000+ Unique Items
    The item system consists of common loot that are randomly generated from different affix pools. Runewords that can be created using white item bases that have sockets by socketing specific runes into them. Satanic, Set, Heroic, Angelic and Unholy items which are considered the "unique" items of the game. These items are hand made to fill a specific purpose or gimmick. All items in the game have randomly rolled stat ranges which determine how powerful the item becomes when unidentified.
  • Tarethiel Market
    Hero Siege provides a Market where you can list your items for sale and buy items from other players! This is an essential part of the game!
  • Adventure Journal
    Information is important so we have made a journal which can be found behind the exit menu by pressing esc. This journal shows you all the Runewords, Items, Prospect combos, Crafting combos and item Augments in the game.
  • Endless Replayablity
    Hero Siege is designed to be played in seasonal cycles like any ARPG. We are adding content in the form of new items, gimmicks, bosses, events or whatever crazy our team comes up with each season!
  • Wormholes
    Wormholes offer the player a challenge to try and get the most out of their character and also obtain seasonal rewards depending on how high you are able to go! Seasonal rewards consist of cosmetics of all sorts, from skins to portraits to wings etc.
  • BIG NO-NO for Pay to Win
    We will never offer any advantages for gameplay by spending real money. A fair environment is very important to us developers!
